text:

text:
12 Felician sisters, ranging in age from 69 to 99, worked and lived together at a Michigan convent — some for more than a half century. They all died from Covid-19 and its effects within a month. 

In June, a 13th sister died after contracting the virus. https://t.co/1pSqCZqrIi
